name: preview-jsdoc
description: Provide a simple preview of your jsdoc

previewjsdoc.autoOpenBrowser.description: Automatically open the browser window when saving a js or md file

previewjsdoc.conf.deprecationMessage: This properties is deprecated. You should use the previewjsdoc.confFile setting instead
previewjsdoc.conf.description: JSON Configuration options. More details on http://usejsdoc.org/about-configuring-jsdoc.html

previewjsdoc.confFile.description:
The Json configuration file, it can be relative from the workspace or absolute.
 More details on http://usejsdoc.org/about-configuring-jsdoc.html

previewjsdoc.output.description:
The output where jsdoc generates files. 
If not defined, the default output is in a cache directory.

previewjsdoc.tutorials.description: List of tutorials paths which will be concatenated to a single one and used instead of opts.tutorials

previewjsdoc.withPrivate.description: Include symbols marked with the @private tag in the generated documentation. By default, private symbols are not included.
